name: Annie at the Edge of the Universe
name_original: Annie at the Edge of the Universe
description:
You are Dr Annie Safina, the newest researcher aboard the Starship Horizon, exploring beyond the borders of human civilization. Atleast, that was your life yesterday.

You wake up, to find yourself in a rapidly leaking environment suit, every ship alarm activated and no one else in sight. Can you stay alive long enough to find out what is happening?

My entry for the Adaptive Music Jam 2021. This game acts as a prologue scene for an imagined full version of Annie at the Edge of the Universe. I hope you enjoy!

Made with Unity and WWise. To play: unzip and run the .exe.

Controls:

WASD - move
Mouse - look around
space - jump
e - interact with computers and oxygen bottles
escape - pause/menu
shift - hold to sprint
